sentences.en: " Oh, a couple of girls over here in Fortieth Street.
sentences.cn: “ 哦, 这边四十街上的两个姑娘.

sentences.en: Beijing is close to the fortieth parallel of north latitude.
Cousins even to the fortieth remove would flock thither to hear the will read.
sentences.cn: 稍有一点沾亲的老表们也都来听宣读遗嘱.

sentences.en: Don't worry about your fortieth birthday, Arthur, you're still in the prime of your life.
sentences.cn: 阿瑟, 不要担心你的40岁生日, 你仍处于旺盛之年.

sentences.en: I'm in my fortieth year, but I am sound in wind and limb.
sentences.cn: 我虽已四十多岁了, 但身体依然健康矍铄.

sentences.en: In 1997, we had a ceremony on the lawn of Central High for the fortieth anniversary.
sentences.cn: 1997年, 我们又在小石城中心高中的草坪上举行了一次隆重的40周年纪念仪式.

sentences.en: It was past midnight, and my fortieth birthday had begun.
sentences.cn: 子夜已过, 我的40岁生日已经到来.

sentences.en: It was the fortieth anniversary of the death of the composer.
sentences.cn: 这是该作曲家逝世40周年纪念日。

sentences.en: It's very common for runners to have anxiety dreams about a race, whether it's their first or their fortieth.
sentences.cn: 这都是赛跑者共有的关于一场比赛焦虑的幻想，无论这是他们的第一场还是第四十场赛事。

sentences.en: John and I celebrate our fortieth anniversary next month.
sentences.cn: 下个月John和我将庆祝我们的结婚四十年纪念.

sentences.en: Mr Li had his fortieth birthday yesterday.
sentences.cn: 李老师昨天度过了他的四十岁生日.

sentences.en: My office is on the fortieth floor.
sentences.cn: 我的办公室在四十层楼上面.

sentences.en: The office ④on the fortieth floor ③of a skyscraper ②in the center ①of New York is the world he works in.
sentences.cn: 设在位于①纽约市②中心③一座摩天大楼④第四十层楼里的⑤那间办公室，就是他工作的小天地。

sentences.en: This city is close to the fortieth parallel of north latitude.

trans.tran_cn: 第四十的，四十分之一的
